TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ImageKeyConverter extends System.ComponentModel.StringConverter

summary.span: 提供型別轉換子 (Type Converter)，將影像索引鍵的資料與其他資料型別相互轉換。

span.span: Provides a type converter to convert data for an image key to and from another data type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別用來將轉換的索引鍵值與其他資料型別。The class is used to convert key values of an to and from other data types. 如需型別轉換子的詳細資訊，請參閱基底類別和[如何： 實作型別轉換子](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/90373a3f-d8c8-492d-841c-945d62393c56)。For more information about type converters, see the base class and [How to: Implement a Type Converter](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/90373a3f-d8c8-492d-841c-945d62393c56). > [!NOTE] > 一般而言，您無法直接建立的執行個體。Typically, you do not directly create an instance of an . 請改為呼叫 類別的 方法。Instead, call the method of the class. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱中的範例基底類別。For more information, see the examples in the base class.

summary.span: 傳回與指定內容關聯之影像清單的標準影像索引鍵集合。

span.span: Returns a collection of standard image keys for the image list associated with the specified context.

returns.span: ，包含標準的影像索引鍵值集合。

span.span: A that contains the standard set of image key values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果不找到任何映像清單，而支援`null`做為標準的值，方法會傳回集合，其中包含單一的空字串。If no image list is found, and the supports `null` as a standard value, the method returns a collection containing a single empty string. 如果不找到任何映像清單，並`null`不支援標準值，作為傳回空集合。If no image list is found, and `null` is not supported as a standard value, returns an empty collection.

summary.span: 判斷 的標準值清單是否為獨佔 (也就是，是否允許由 所傳回之值以外的值)。

span.span: Determines whether the list of standard values for the is exclusive (that is, whether it allows values other than those returned by ).

returns.span: 表示清單不允許其他的值，否則為 。

span.span: to indicate the list does not allow additional values; otherwise, .
Always returns .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果所傳回的清單方法是獨佔，沒有其他的值為有效。If the list returned by the method is exclusive, no other values are valid. 這是典型的列舉的資料型別。This is typical of an enumerated data type. 如果清單不是獨佔的有其他有效的值標準的清單值 besides提供。If the list is not exclusive, there are other valid values besides the list of standard values that provides. 在此型別轉換子中實作時，此方法一律傳回`true`。As implemented in this type converter, this method always returns `true`. 一般而言，您應該呼叫方法，然後再嘗試使用和方法。Typically, you should call the method before you attempt to use the and methods.

Always returns .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 中實作類別，方法一律會傳回`true`因為支援一組標準的索引值可以從清單中選取的映像。As implemented in the class, the method always returns `true` since supports a standard set of index values for images that can be picked from a list.
